data.name: Building1
data.value:
Barracks  allow you to recruit and train foot soldiers.

As you upgrade the Barracks, recruitment and training of troops becomes more efficient and you are able to attract and train new recruits faster.

Remember that building an army is a time consuming process so it is a good idea to upgrade barracks to a high level to minimize this time

data.name: Building10
data.value:
Siege Workshop  allows you to construct siege engines. You need siege equipment to destroy the defenses of enemy fortress. It is a very difficult and bloody task for an army to storm a well defended fortress without the help of siege equipment.

As you upgrade the Siege Workshop, your engineers become more efficient at constructing the machines resulting in quicker production.

Remember that constructing siege equipment is a costly and very time consuming process so it is a good idea to upgrade Siege Workshop to a high level to minimize this time

data.name: Building11
data.value:
Trading Post allows you to transport silver between villages.

You can transport silver between your own villages but you can also send silver to other player's villages.

The higher the level of this building, the higher your transport capacity.

data.name: Building12
data.value:
Tavern, a gathering place for many interesting characters, including those that are good at... at not being seen when they choose not to. Just the type of patron you will want to recruit into your spy network! Therefore tavern allows you to recruit spies.

Spies are able to covertly learn details about other villages so they could prove a valuable asset to your war machine.

The higher the level of the tavern, the more patrons it attracts enabling you to recruit spies much faster.

data.name: Building2
data.value:
Stable  allows you to recruit and train cavalry.

As you upgrade the Stable, recruitment and training of cavalry becomes more efficient and you are able to attract and train faster.

Remember that building an army is a time consuming process so it is a good idea to upgrade Stable to a high level to minimize this time

data.name: Building3
data.value:
Headquarters  is where you give commands to your workers to construct or upgrade buildings in the village.

You can also upgrade the Headquarters building itself. As you upgrade the Headquarters, the workers in your village get more and more efficient and as a result, construction takes less and less time.

data.name: Building4
data.value:
Wall protects the village from attacks. Wall by itself does little to protect the village however the wall does improve the defensive ability of the troops defending the village. The higher the level, the better job the wall does.

The wall can be damaged and/or destroyed with Rams.

data.name: Building5
data.value:
Silver Mine is the primary source of your wealth. Silver mine produces a steady supply of silver for you to mint coins. The higher the level of the silver mine, the more silver it yields per hour.

But be aware that silver produced is stored in your Treasury which has a storage limit so spend your silver before the treasury becomes full or your production will halt.

data.name: Building6
data.value: Treasury is where you store your silver coins. As silver is produced, it is stored in the treasury. However, the treasury has a storage limit and when reached, your silver mine stops production. Therefore, it is a good idea to upgrade the treasury to be able to store a fair amount of silver.

data.name: Building7
data.value:
Defensive Towers are perimeter wall towers as well as gate house towers that greatly improve the ability of the troops to defend the village.

Defensive towers can be damaged and/or destroyed with Trebuchets.

data.name: Building8
data.value:
Farm land is the source of food. Farms produce food which allow you to feed workers working or maintaining the buildings in your village, as well as for troops you recruit.

Every building requires a certain amount of workers to maintain or work in it. The higher the level of the building, the more workers you need. Those workers, as well as troops are fed with the produce of the surrounding farms.

The higher the level of the farm land, the more food you are able to produce.

You can never recruit more troops, or hire more workers than your farm can support as excess food is perishable and is not stored. Excess food is most welcomed by the usually half starved villages, and is eaten in big and wild festivals at every possible occasion.

data.name: Building9
data.value: Palace  is where you entertain your guests and where aristocrats gather. Palaces are the perfect and necessary place to attract aristocrats to join your realm in performing the role of governors. Governors are necessary for you to take over another village as they are the ones who convince the enemy's village council of elders to join your kingdom, and stay at the new village to govern it.

data.name: email_InviteAccepted_Subject
data.value: Hello from {0}. Thanks for the invite!!

data.name: email_InviteAccepted1_body
data.value:
Hey {0}!

This is {1} aka {2}, thanks for the invite!

I joined and accepted your invite while registering
{0}, This is an automated message telling you that your friend has joined the realm and has accepted your invite.

{2} has already been invited to your clan on your behalf.

Good luck to both of you!
Realm Of Empires team

data.name: email_InviteAccepted2_body
data.value:
Hey {0}!

This is {1} aka {2}, thanks for the invite!

I joined and accepted your invite while registering
{0}, This is an automated message telling you that your friend has joined the realm and has accepted your invite.

{2} has NOT been invited to your clan since you lack invite permission. Consider contacting your clan leaders and either ask them for an invite, or ask for invite permissions.

Good luck to both of you!
Realm of Empires team

data.name: email_KTitleInviteFriendsMsg_body
data.value:
Congratulations Freeman {0}!


Congratulation on your first step into freedom and nobility!


Since you have proven yourself as an adept player, we would like to extend to you an exclusive offer, available to Freeman only - We would like to offer you a recruitment reward of 30 servants per Freeman!! details...

Invite a friend and claim your reward when they reach a title of Freeman! When your friend joins, you will get an email notifying you of this and hence will be able to mentor them on their way if you wish. details... Once again, Congratulations and in advance, thank you for helping us grow and improve.


This is an automated message, please do not reply

data.name: email_KTitleInviteFriendsMsg_subject
data.value: Congratulations! Welcome to Freedom with its exclusive rights!

data.name: email1_body
data.value: Congratulations oh mighty {0}! Your hard work and dedication has paid off! A big congratulation from Realm Of Empires team! By now you know the dynamics of the game well, and if you enjoy it, we would very much like to ask you to help us grow and improve by liking Realm of Empires. If you would also share, not only would you earn our eternal gratitude but, as a thank you, we'll also reward your efforts with 10 servants Please keep in mind that we are still actively developing the game and there are many more features and improvements to come! Once again, Congratulations and in advance, thank you for helping us grow and improve. This is an automated message, please do not reply

data.name: email1_subject
data.value: Congratulations and a gift!

data.name: tou
data.value:
Realm of Empires strives to be a fun, rewarding online gaming experience for everyone. It is expected that players treat each other with common courtesy and respect. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate any account that engages in the following:

Malicious Intent
  • Attempting to deface or damage www.realmofempires.com or Realm of Empires in general
  • Spamming, excessive posting, or disrupting normal communication in realm, in the Throne Room or on the forums
  • Using our communication channels for the purpose other than to support you game play


    • Cheating
  • Creating multiple accounts – creating multiple accounts in game using multiple accounts is prohibited. Only one account per player is allowed.
  • Logging in with other players accounts (consensually or not) to play Realm of Empires on their behalf will be detected and is against TOU. Use the Stewardship feature (if available).
  • Creating or using an account for the sole purpose of aiding another account is strictly prohibited.
  • Using automated scripts (bots), including client side scripts like Greasemonkey scripts.
  • Accessing the game via any User Interface other than through the html website available through www.realmofempires.com, or via Realm of Empires provided mobile applications.
  • Exploiting a bug - A player that discovers a bug that gives him/her an unfair advantage is expected to report the bug to realmofempires.com immediately. Exploiting any bugs to your advantage is prohibited.


    • Posting offensive material
  • Any posts (emails, forum posts, village names, clan names, player names, etc) that we deem inappropriate or offensive or discriminatory or profane are not permitted and may result in edit, deletion, warning issued or suspension in case of repeated violations
  • Any posts that encourage, link to, or promote illegal activity.
  • Spamming the discussion boards to promote another game, business, political agenda or religious philosophy
  • Physically threatening a player “in real-life” is not allowed (although in-game threats of attacking are ok).
  • No pornographic material (text or graphics) is allowed in Realm of Empires.


    • Language
  • All communication on Realm of Empires is expected to be in English so that everyone who plays can understand.


    • By accepting the terms of use, the player accepts the following:

    Servants
  • Servants are the in game currency used to unlock various premium features or the nobility package.
  • There are two types of servants transferable (typically purchased through paypal or completing offers) and non-transferable (typically given as gifts from other players, rewards from contests etc.)
  • Once acquired, servants are not redeemable for cash, all purchases are final, and no returns will be made.
  • Servants cannot be sold for real money to other players, or transfered to other players as bribes for any benefit in the game. For example, in exchange for silver, attacking other player(s), for villages, or to further one's propaganda.
  • A player whose account is terminated forfeits any outstanding servants they may have.
  • Availability and prices of any servant deals or packages may change at any time.


    • Copyright
    All images, text on the Realm of Empires application is the property of realmofempires.com. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

    Privacy
    RealmOfEmpires.com respects your privacy.

    Disclaimer
    Realm of Empires is provided as-is. www.realmofempires.com is not responsible for any losses incurred by the player, financial, emotional or otherwise. The Realm of Empires application will, on occasion, be unavailable for server maintenance, hardware and software upgrades. Realm of Empires may also experience unplanned outages due to circumstances beyond our control.

    RealmofEmpires.com reserves the right to amend or change the terms of use at anytime.

data.name: email_MsgToFriendUponRealmJoin_Body
data.value:
Hey {0}!

Hey! This is {1} aka {2}!

I just joined this realm as well! Happy gaming!!
{0}, This is an automated message telling you that your friend has joined this realm!

If you are an advanced player, consider helping your friend out. Perhaps you may enjoy mentoring them along, sharing your strategies and hard-earned lessons. Perhaps you are new, in which case you may benefit from guidance from your friend. Remember that this is first most a game of diplomacy and co-operation. It is designed so that working with others is the key to success.

To get in contact with your friend, simply reply to this message.

Good luck to both of you!
Realm Of Empires team

data.value: Hello from {0}!

data.name: SleepModeExplanation
data.value:
Sleep Mode allows you to prevent anyone from launching attacks on your villages while the sleep mode is active - when you go to sleep, or otherwise cannot be at the computer
  • You can activate sleep mode for at most {1} hours in a {0} hour period.
  • Once you activate the sleep mode, you have to wait {2} min before it actually comes to effect (during which time player can still launch attacks at you)
  • Once the sleep mode goes into effect no one will be able to launch an attack at you, during this time. Attacks launched and incoming before sleep mode is active will still land even during the sleep mode. This is critical to understand : being in sleep mode only prevents more attacks from being launched at your villages; it does not prevent currently launched attacks from landing and causing demage.
  • You may cancel the sleep mode anytime BUT you lose the remaining time of protection and must wait until sleep mode is available again to use it again.
  • NOTE - Any attacks against you that are in progress will land, only new attacks will be prevented when sleep mode is enabled.

data.name: email_InviteReward
data.value:
THANKS FOR INVITING - FROM THE REALM OF EMPIRES TEAM!!
Many thanks for helping spread the word about Realm of Empires to your friends!
Thanks for inviting your friends! Please accept this gift of {0} servants as a thank you for helping us grow. We appreciate your efforts, and are very happy to offer you this gift!
Please invite more of your friends now and get more gifts.
Once again, thank you and we hope you are enjoying Realm of Empires as much as we enjoy making it for you!


This is an automated message, please do not reply.

You will receive a duplicate of this message on every realm you play.

data.name: email_FriendNetworkRankingRew
data.value:
Congrats! You just got a reward of {1} servants for your standing in Friend Network Ranking
NEXT REWARD: Get {0} friends in your Friend Network Ranking and win another {1} servants!
Please note that friend network ranking is refreshed once every few hours. Once you reach {0} friends, allow up to 24 hours for the next reward to be delivered (we got to pack the {1} servants in the cart, travel to your villages, avoid the wolves etc... takes a lot of work, so be patient! ;) This is an automated message, please do not reply.

data.name: email_EmailFromClanLeader_Subject
data.value: Email from your clan leader {0}: '{1}'

data.name: email_footer
data.value:
This is an automated player alert from the Facebook game Realm Of Empires; please do not reply
You are receiving this email beacuse you authorized Realm of Empires in facebook.

If you do not want to receive such alerts, you can turn off email notifications. Login and go to Tools & Options -> Options where you can turn off emails from us.


To ensure you do not miss such an alert, please add the sender of this message (PlayerAlerts @ RealmOfEmpires.com) to your safe sender list.

data.name: email_header
help_1
data.value:
Under attack and want to quickly notify friends near by?

It's EASY!
  1. go to Map
  2. click "Show Map Summary"
  3. click " add to message recipients"

data.name: help_2
data.value:
DID YOU KNOW...

...that you can see your note on village on the map?
  1. Put a note on some village
  2. View this village on the map
  3. Hover over this village on the map
  4. You will see the first 10 characters of your note right on the hover over
  5. HINT: You can then use Custom Highlights to highlight this village based on the 10 characters!
